mainPackage

Class Camera

  • java.lang.Object
    • mainPackage.Camera

  • public class Camera
extends java.lang.Object
    Class handling matrices to send to the OpenGL context.
    Author:
    Alan Guitard
    See Also:
    MouseCameraManager

      • Camera

        public Camera(Point3d loc,
      Point3d targ,
      Vector3d up,
      Point3d rotCenter)
        Constructor. Create a camera with the value passed in parameters.
        Parameters:
        loc - location of the point of view
        targ - the target the camera sees
        up - the up vector
        rotCenter - the center of the world's rotation
